Assistant 1 included the detail about the landslide being caused by a sudden collapse of a mountain slope, which was not mentioned in the original story, but it didn't detract from the overall summary. Assistant 2 included the detail about the company being a subsidiary of the China National Gold Group Corp., which was in the original story and added context to the summary. Both summaries were well written and captured the main points of the story, hence the high scores.
